mapper.select: select nvl(max(epnum),0) from episode where contnum=#{contnum}
mapper.update: update episode set hit=hit+1 where epinum=#{epinum}
mapper.select: select ep.* from reading r, episode ep where r.epinum=ep.epinum and readingdate=(select max(readingdate) from reading r, episode ep where r.epinum=ep.epinum and r.usernum=#{usernum} and ep.contnum=#{contnum}) and rownum=1
select * from episode ep where ep.epnum=(select min(epnum) from episode ep where ep.contnum=#{contnum}) and ep.contnum=#{contnum}
select nvl(count(*),0) cnt from episode ep where ep.contnum=#{contnum}
select nvl(count(*),0) cnt from (select ep.epinum cnt from reading r, episode ep, users u where ep.epinum=r.epinum and ep.contnum=#{contnum} and r.usernum=#{usernum} group by ep.epinum)
